thread.title: Family reunion for Melanie Griffiths on the Elle Women in Hollywood Awards red carpet
thread.title_full: Family reunion for Melanie Griffiths on the Elle Women in Hollywood Awards red carpet

title: Family reunion for Melanie Griffiths on the Elle Women in Hollywood Awards red carpet
text:
Family reunion for Melanie Griffiths on the Elle Women in Hollywood Awards red carpet Family reunion for Melanie Griffiths on the Elle Women in Hollywood Awards red carpet 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Brits Kate Winslet and Carey Mulligan were among the stars who turned out in style for Elle’s Women in Hollywood Awards. 
Gracing the red carpet were also three generations of movie-star royalty as Melanie Griffiths brought along her mother Tippi Hedren, famous for her role in Alfred Hitchcock’s The Birds, and her two daughters – 50 Shades of Grey’s Dakota Johnson and Stella Banderas. Dakota Johnson, Tippi Hedren, Melanie Griffith and Stella Banderas (Jordan Strauss/Invision) 
Tippi, 85, looked proud as she stood alongside her granddaughters, Dakota, 26, from Melanie’s relationship with Don Johnson, and Stella, 19, who she shares with ex-husband Antonio Banderas. 
The awards show was packed with Hollywood’s most sought after female stars, including Salma Hayek, who continued to look a decade younger than her 49 years. 
Comedienne Amy Schumer, 34, sizzled in a slinky red dress days after speaking about her lack of body confidence on the Today show. Her friend Lena Dunham was also spotted at the event at LA’s Four Seasons Hotel. 
Here are some of the stars on the red carpet. Kate Winslet
